sentences.sContent: Wholemeal bread is more nutritious than white bread.
sentences.sCn: 全麦面包比白面包更有营养。

sentences.sContent: Nuts and fruit make nutritious snacks.
sentences.sCn: 坚果和水果是有营养价值的零食。

sentences.sContent: The cookbook contains many simple yet highly nutritious meals.
sentences.sCn: 那本烹饪书里有许多简单却营养价值很高的食谱。

sentences.sContent: ...Even chocolate milk is more nutritious than soda or a sports drink...
...You can be sure to get a nutritious meal when you pick foods from the Food Guide Pyramid...

words.tran: 有营养的；滋养的；有营养成份的；与营养有关的
营养物；促进生长的东西

trans.tranOther: food that is nutritious is full of the natural substances that your body needs to stay healthy or to grow properly
